name: Cold Reception
description:
Christmas is right around the corner, but something is wrong in the North Pole!  Santa's elves have all turned evil and are attacking everything in sight.  It's up to you to fight your way into Santa's factory and put and end to this chaos before Christmas is ruined!

Controls:

A/D - Move Left/Right

W/Space - Jump

Left Click - Melee

Right Click - Shoot Snowball

Team:

Jacob Sharp

Andrew Nguyen

Aidan Schiavone

Brennan Crowder

This game was made for the TU Game Designers Winter Jam

All assets were created by the development team
